title: Lee Yong Do’s Collection of Sci-fi Shorts - Novel Updates
author: Lee Yong Do   이영도
description:
A collection of some of Lee Yong Do’s short stories about science fiction.
Lee Yong Do is an author of novels such as Dragon Raja, The Bird That Drinks Tears, and Polaris Rhapsody. 

1. About The Translation of Khaliafanden

2. About The Robot That Became A Messiah

3. About The Art of Stitching Stars

4. About The Mother of Revenge>
